response.overview: A radio astronomer receives the first extraterrestrial radio signal ever picked up on Earth. As the world powers scramble to decipher the message and decide upon a course of action, she must make some difficult decisions between her beliefs, the truth, and reality.
response.tagline: Take a journey to the heart of the universe.
response.title: Contact

release_dates.note: VHS release; The release day in April is not known.
